{
  Nom nom1;
  is >> nom1;
  if (nproc() > 1)
    {
      Cout << "Ecrire::interpreter " << nom1 << " not done in parallel !" << finl;
    }
  else
    {
      Objet_U& ob1=objet(nom1);
      Cout << "["<<Process::me()<<"] "<< ob1 << finl;
    }
  return is;
}
